snippet: In the latest cautionary tale about social networks, three men have been accused of raping children they met using a mobile app designed for flirting between adults.
abstract: In the latest cautionary tale about social networks, three men have been accused of raping children they met using a mobile app designed for flirting between adults.

headline.main: After Rapes Involving Children, Skout, a Flirting App, Bans Minors
headline.print_headline: 3 Child Rapes Cast Chill on Popular Social App
